Class.name: Custom.QUESTIONNAIREQWDHSPOSTOP
Class.Description: WDHS Op Report Post Op Orders
Class.ViewQuery: SELECT ID AS ROWID, QQ1 AS Observations, QQ1R AS ObservationDetails, QQ4 AS FluidBalanceChart, QQ7 AS SpecificSurgicalInstructions, QQ7a AS SpecificSurgicalComment, QQ8 AS RLHeartRateMin, QQ8a AS RLHeartRateMax, QQ9 AS RLSystolicBPMin, QQ9a AS RLSystolicBPMax, QQ10 AS RLRespRateMin, QQ10a AS RLRespRateMax, QQ11 AS RLSPO2Min, QQ12 AS RLTempMin, QQ13 AS RLUrineOutputMin, QQ13a AS RLUrineOutputHours, QQ14 AS SpecificAnaestheticOrders, QQ15 AS SpecificPostOperativeTests, QQ16 AS SpecificPostOpTestsComment, QQ17 AS PostOperativeAppointments, QQ18 AS PostOpAppointmentsComments, QQ19 AS Position, QQ19a AS PositionComment, QQ20 AS Mobility, QQ20a AS MobilityOtherComment, QQ21 AS Diet, QQ21a AS SpecifyDietComment, QQ22 AS NGTube, QQ22a AS SpecifyNGTube, QQ23 AS IntravenousFluids, QQ24 AS OxygenTherapy, QQ24a AS OxygenTherapyOtherComment, QQ25 AS Antibiotics, QQ26 AS PainAntiemeticTreatment, QQ27 AS DVTProphylaxis, QQ28 AS CoExistingDrugTherapy, QQ29 AS Dressingsspecify, QQ42 AS DCMobiliseNormally, QQ43 AS DCDietNormal, QQ44 AS DCAntibiotics, QQ45 AS DCAnalgesia, QQ46 AS DCAntiemetics, QQ47 AS DischargePrescriptionCompleted, QQ48 AS MedicalCertificateRequired, QQ42a AS DCMobiliseNormallyComment, QQ43a AS DCDietComments, QQ49 AS Drainsspecify, QHOSP AS Hospital, QSurgeon AS Surgeon, QOpDate AS OperationDate, QAnaesthetist AS Anaesthetist, QAssistant AS Assistant, QOperation AS Operation, QOpDiagnosis AS OperativeDiagnosis, QOpDetails AS DetailsOfOperation, QPathology AS SpecimensToPathology, QCtrlClick AS CtrlclickToSelectMultiple, QCtrlClick1 AS CtrlclickToSelectMultipleQCTRLCLICK1, QCtrlClick2 AS CtrlclickToSelectMultipleQCTRLCLICK2, QUESDate AS DateUpdated, QUESTime AS TimeUpdated, QUESUserDR->SSUSR_RowId AS UserUpdated, QUESCreateDate AS DateCreated, QUESCreateTime AS TimeCreated, QUESCreateUserDR->SSUSR_RowId AS UserCreated, QUESScore AS Score, QUESStatusDR AS Status FROM questionnaire.QWDHSPOSTOP
